segments.text: Yes , I played with Tony and John .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you do after you'd played football ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going swimming again this afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we aren't . We're going to help Mr Smith to plant some flowers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you helping him all afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are . We can neither play football nor do our homework today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're , going to be very busy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we certainly are . But Mr Smith is going to pay us for all the work we'll do .
segments.speaker: S2
